Main pronunciation 主要发音: yù

Other pronunciations 其它发音: Not exists.

Original meaning 本义: Meaning (orig) good smelling (now) luxuriant; dense, thick; moody.

English senses 英语理解:

Usage example 用法举例: 鬱悶 yù mèn （gloomy)

Importance by frequency 常用频率: 99999

Shuowen 说文解字: 木叢生者從林鬱省聲

Character decomposition 字形分解 :
Compound 鬱 mutants 鬰欝 yù from (rem- 冂 jiōng) and forest 林 lín and container 缶 fǒu and bowl-of-rice 鬯 chàng and (rem+ 彡 shān smoke)(rem+ 爻 yáo tinder) C713 鬱<鬰欝> A305 郁[鬱] simp 郁.

Decomposition notes 字形分解说明 :
(- 彡 vapor - 冂 oven 林 - wood 鬯 food)

Simplification rule : A305 郁[鬱]

Simplification rule explained :
existing-char phonetic-phonetic 郁 (gloomy, sweet smelling) 鬱 (thick, rich)

Variant rule : C713 鬱<鬰欝>

Variant rule clarification :
鬱 (aromatic) TW 鬰 <aromatic> 欝 <aromatic>

欝字的基本解释

欝
yù
同“郁”①②。

欝字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yù］
［《廣韻》紆物切，入物，影。］
亦作“欎1”。同“鬱1”。
(1)盛，充盈。
(2)滞积。
(3)腐臭变质。
(4)抑郁，忧思。参见“欝伊”、“欝紆”。
(5)见“欝律”。

欝字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　欝； 康熙笔画：26； 页码：页564第21
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?紆勿切，氳入聲。【說文】作鬱。【廣韻】鬱之俗也。木叢生也。香草也。又氣也，長也，幽也，滯也，腐臭也。悠思也。詳鬱字註。　又欝壘，神名。【風俗通】黃帝時有神荼、欝壘兄弟二人，在度索山桃樹下?閱百鬼。

欝字的起名意思

暂无。

[①]［yù］
["Guangyun" cuts into objects, enters objects, and shadows. ]
Also known as "1". Same as "Yu 1".
(1) Sheng, full.
(2) Hysteresis.
(3) Rancidity and deterioration.
(4) Depression, worry. See "欝伊", "欝纡".
(5) See "Law".

Yousi also. Detailed note of Yu words.　You Zhan Lei, the name of God.
